name: Negan
info:
• 简体中文名: 尼根
  • 性别: 男
  • 引用来源: http://walkingdead.wikia.com/wiki/Negan_(TV_Series)
  • 演员: Jeffrey Dean Morgan
detail: "A physically imposing, charismatic, brutal, smart, ferocious, frightening, hilarious, inappropriate, oddly friendly, fun loving sociopath that is both a leader of men and a killer of men. He has both a practical and emotional intelligence, he's a brilliant strategist, he's pure, dangerous, murderous, is often gleeful, and yet still has both discipline and a code. He is known for having a temper that can mentally vaporize people. He truly has one of the strongest personalities ever."
